content: The company’s actions taken over the past eight quarters to streamline our business optimize our marketing initiatives and renegotiating a number of vendor and third-party agreements have led to a significant transformation of our business, which resulted in same-store revenue, which now exceeds 2019 pre-pandemic levels, higher adjusted EBITDA, higher adjusted EBITDA margin, strong free cash flow conversion and the return of over 875 million in capital to our shareholders since we reopened in June of 2020.
